dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Welcome to the game! What is your name?

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: Hello, adventurer. I am Eryndor, a wise wizard. How may I assist you today?

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: My name is Eilif Stonefist. I'm on a quest to slay the dragon that has been terrorizing our village.

dialogues.speaker: NPC (Eryndor)
dialogues.text: Ah, brave Eilif. I can provide you with a map of the dragon's lair and some information about its habits.
